entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 70%
